name: ricky gervais: supernature

name: franco escamilla: eavesdropping

name: chris rock: selective outrage

name: ronny chieng: asian comedian destroys america!

name: cem yılmaz: diamond elite platinum plus

name: dave chappelle

name: dave chappelle: the closer

name: trevor noah: son of patricia

name: sheng wang: sweet and juicy

name: wanda sykes: i'm an entertainer

name: mark normand: soup to nuts

name: jimmy carr: his dark material

name: best of stand-up 2022

name: russell peters: almost famous

name: jo koy: live from seattle

name: ellen degeneres: relatable

name: ali wong: hard knock wife

name: jo koy: live from the los angeles forum

name: dr jason leong hashtag blessed

name: dave chappelle: sticks & stones

name: bill burr: live at red rocks
creator: guillermo del toro

name: jeff dunham: beside himself

name: jo koy: comin' in hot

starring: jo koy

name: tom segura: sledgehammer
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: tom segura

name: ronny chieng: speakeasy
creator: guillermo del toro

name: dave chappelle: equanimity & the bird revelation

name: taylor tomlinson: look at you

name: taylor tomlinson: quarter-life crisis

name: ali wong: don wong

starring: ali wong

name: ali wong: baby cobra
creator: guillermo del toro

name: kevin hart: irresponsible
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: kevin hart

name: daniel sloss: live shows
creator: guillermo del toro

name: iliza shlesinger: hot forever
creator: guillermo del toro

name: whindersson nunes: preaching to the choir
creator: guillermo del toro

name: trevor noah: afraid of the dark

name: kevin hart: what now?

name: shane gillis: beautiful dogs

name: michelle wolf: it's great to be here

name: jared freid: 37 & single

name: the honeymoon stand up special
creator: guillermo del toro

name: russell howard: lubricant
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: russell howard

name: cheuk wan-chi: two night stand
creator: guillermo del toro

name: jonas brothers family roast

name: the standups
creator: guillermo del toro

name: that’s my time with david letterman

name: the degenerates

name: stand up and away! with brian regan

name: plastic cup boyz: laughing my mask off!

name: james acaster: repertoire

name: tiffany haddish presents: they ready

name: patton oswalt: i love everything

name: zona rosa

name: fary: hexagone

name: the comedy lineup
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: janelle james, matteo lane, aisling bea
describle: a diverse group of up-and-coming comedians perform 15-minute sets in this stand-up comedy showcase series.

name: ladies up
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: prashasti singh, kaneez surka, niveditha prakasam
describle: rising india-based comics prashasti singh, kaneez surka, supriya joshi and niveditha prakasam bring no-holds-barred humor to this stand-up series.

name: locombianos
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: freddy beltrán, pamela ospina, diego camargo
describle: four of colombia's funniest and bawdiest comedians perform before a post-quarantine audience hungry for their stories.

name: schulz saves america
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: andrew schulz
describle: comedian andrew schulz takes on the year's most divisive topics in this fearlessly unfiltered and irreverent four-part special.

name: felipe esparza: bad decisions
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: felipe esparza
describle: two live performances, one in english and one in spanish. no matter the language, felipe esparza is muy muy.

name: bumping mics with jeff ross & dave attell
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: jeff ross, dave attell
describle: when jeff ross and dave attell take the stage, no one is safe. with the help of special guests, they're packing a lot of laughs into one epic weekend.

name: comedians of the world
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: neal brennan, chris d'elia, nicole byer
describle: a diverse set of 47 comedians from 13 regions bring their perspective on what's funny around the world. browse and discover by selecting "episodes."

name: whitney cummings: jokes
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: whitney cummings
describle: whitney gets personal about sex injuries and dating younger men, spills on her online photo leak and waxes nostalgic about life before social media.

name: michelle wolf: joke show
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: michelle wolf
describle: comedian michelle wolf takes on outrage culture, massages, childbirth, feminism and much more (like otters) in a stand-up special from new york city.

name: my name is mo’nique
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: mo'nique
describle: you think you know mo'nique? from staring down a racist teacher to her grandmother's sex warning, she spills all in this stand-up comedy special.

name: celeste barber: fine, thanks
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: celeste barber
describle: actor and comedian celeste barber takes the stage in sydney to get personal in public about marriage, mental health, celebrity-branded sex toys and more.

name: whitney cummings: can i touch it?
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: whitney cummings
describle: in her fourth stand-up special, whitney cummings returns to her hometown of washington, d.c., and riffs on modern feminism, technology and more.

name: nikki glaser: bangin’
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: nikki glaser
describle: nikki glaser bares all in a blistering stand-up special about sex, sobriety and getting over her own insecurities. and she won't spare you the details.

name: leslie jones: time machine
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: leslie jones
describle: from trying to seduce prince to battling sleep apnea, leslie jones traces her evolution as an adult in a joyfully raw and outrageous stand-up special.

name: katherine ryan: glitter room
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: katherine ryan
describle: fresh from a tour, comedian katherine ryan shares shrewd observations about school bullies, revenge bodies and raising a very fancy child.

name: amy schumer: emergency contact
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: amy schumer
describle: amy schumer gets real about lasering her face, postpartum sex, her baby-naming disaster and chewable viagra in this cheekily candid stand-up special.

name: garfunkel and oates: trying to be special
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: riki lindhome, kate micucci, anthony jeselnik
describle: garfunkel and oates put on a surprise-filled show in seattle in hopes of raising enough money to make their own comedy special.

name: fortune feimster: sweet & salty
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: fortune feimster
describle: actor, comedian and writer fortune feimster takes the stage and riffs on her southern roots, sexual awakenings, showbiz career and more.

name: sarah silverman a speck of dust
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: sarah silverman
describle: in her first comedy special post-health scare, sarah silverman shares a mix of fun facts, sad truths and yeah-she-just-went-there moments.

name: hazel brugger: tropical
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: hazel brugger
describle: in this stand-up special, comedian hazel brugger offers her breezy takes on unruly geese, chatty gynecologists, german bank loans and more.

name: wanda sykes: not normal
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: wanda sykes
describle: wanda sykes tackles politics, reality tv, racism and the secret she'd take to the grave in this rollicking, no-holds-barred stand-up special.

name: katherine ryan: in trouble
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: katherine ryan
describle: stand-up comic katherine ryan reminisces about unusual relationships, life in the hometown she hates and the time she enraged an entire nation.

name: chelsea handler: revolution
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: chelsea handler
describle: chelsea handler lets loose on her life choices, rowdy rescue dogs, dating frustrations and her vision for a future where men don't wear flip-flops.

name: lynne koplitz: hormonal beast
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: lynne koplitz
describle: unabashed comedian lynne koplitz offers a woman's take on being crazy, the benefits of childlessness and the three things all men really want.

name: jen kirkman: i'm gonna die alone (and i feel fine)
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: jen kirkman
describle: jen kirkman delivers some sharp, hilarious truths about divorce, kids, sex and turning 40 in this netflix original comedy special.

name: ms. pat: y'all wanna hear something crazy?
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: ms. pat
describle: ms. pat finds laughter in the absurdities of parenting, pet lovers and very unfortunate lip trends as she unpacks a painful past with humor and honesty.

name: catherine cohen: the twist…? she’s gorgeous
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: catherine cohen
describle: in this sparkling cocktail of standup and song, catherine cohen serenades about looking for love, the absurdity of marathons and burying someone alive.

name: leanne morgan: i'm every woman
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: leanne morgan
describle: she loves jell-o salad, her three kids and her beefy grandbaby. leanne morgan shares stories about her life as a wife, mother and wearer of big panties.

name: amy schumer growing
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: amy schumer
describle: amy schumer spills on her new marriage, personal growth, making a baby and her mom's misguided advice in a special that's both raunchy and sincere.

name: michela giraud: the truth, i swear!
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: michela giraud
describle: career success. fame's shortcomings. the cringeworthy label of "curvy" and tough ballet days during her youth. michela giraud has a whole lot to unpack.

name: cristela alonzo: middle classy
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: cristela alonzo
describle: comedian cristela alonzo spills on learning english from "the price is right," getting covid on her birthday and how money really can buy happiness.

name: anjelah johnson: not fancy
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: anjelah johnson-reyes
describle: the actress, comedian and youtube sensation riffs on everything from nail salons and gypsies to mexican moms and super-sleuthing liam neeson.

name: iliza shlesinger: elder millennial
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: iliza shlesinger
describle: newly engaged comic iliza shlesinger dives into undeniable truths about life at age 35, the insanity of the road traveled and what's to come.

name: urzila carlson: overqualified loser
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: urzila carlson
describle: stand-up comedian urzila carlson keeps the crowd roaring with her thoughts on recasting "the biggest loser," sex tape regrets and boxed wine hangovers.

name: fadily camara : la plus drôle de tes copines
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: fadily camara
describle: irrepressible french comedian fadily camara weaves jokes, vivid characters and physical comedy into a lively stand-up show at la cigale in paris.

name: amy schumer: the leather special
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: amy schumer
describle: comic sensation amy schumer riffs on sex, dating and the absurdities of fame in a bold and uncensored stand-up set at denver's bellco theater.

name: christina p: mother inferior
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: christina pazsitzky
describle: christina pazsitzky hits seattle with a biting dose of reality, telling truths about her childhood, getting older and the horrors of giving birth.

name: kavin jay: everybody calm down!
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: kavin jay
describle: on a mission to defy stereotypes, malaysian stand-up comedian kavin jay shares stories about growing up in the vhs era with his singapore audience.

name: dr. jason leong: ride with caution
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: jason leong
describle: in his latest stand-up special, former doctor jason leong shares his diagnoses on aging, the absurdity of middle-aged cycling enthusiasts and more.

name: harith iskander: i told you so
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: harith iskander
describle: malaysian stand-up comedy icon harith iskander takes the stage in kuala lumpur to talk about singapore, a past girlfriend, rick astley and more.

name: fakkah fuzz: almost banned
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: fakkah fuzz
describle: stand-up comic fakkah fuzz mines cross-cultural humor from the experience of growing up as an outspoken malay man in singapore.

name: yoo byung jae: too much information
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: yoo byung jae
describle: "saturday night live korea" writer-turned-comedian yoo byung-jae lays bare his childhood memories and philosophy on sex in his first stand-up venture.

name: lee su-geun: the sense coach
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: lee su-geun
describle: lee su-geun's rise to korean comedy stardom went hand in hand with his mastery over picking up social cues. now, he's ready to share his know-hows.

name: yoo byung jae: discomfort zone
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: yoo byung jae
describle: daring comedian yoo byung-jae connects criticism he's received from the general public to some of the most touchy issues in current korean society.

name: park na-rae: glamour warning
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: park na-rae
describle: korea’s beloved comedian and favorite big sister figure talks sex, relationships and celebrity life. and she’s sassier and dirtier than ever before.

name: russell brand: re:birth
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: russell brand
describle: russell brand gets loquacious in london as he ruminates on the state of the world and marvels over how his life changed the moment he became a father.

name: chris tucker live
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: chris tucker
describle: filmed in his hometown of atlanta, chris tucker showcases his stand-up comedic chops as he shares his experiences from childhood to the big time.

name: ricky gervais: humanity
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: ricky gervais
describle: in his first special in seven years, ricky gervais slings his trademark snark at celebrity, mortality and a society that takes everything personally.

name: ken jeong: you complete me, ho
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: ken jeong
describle: in his first-ever stand-up special, ken jeong pays tribute to his wife and shares stories about hollywood and how "the hangover" saved his life.

name: bill burr: walk your way out
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: bill burr
describle: no-nonsense comic bill burr takes the stage in nashville and riffs on fast food, overpopulation, dictators and gorilla sign language.

name: katt williams: great america
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: katt williams
describle: the king of underground comedy delivers unflinching riffs on the american political climate, racial tensions, sex and his disdain for roast beef.

name: adam devine: best time of our lives
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: adam devine
describle: frenetic comic adam devine talks teen awkwardness, celebrity encounters, his "pitch perfect" audition and more in a special from his hometown of omaha.

name: bert kreischer: razzle dazzle
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: bert kreischer
describle: shameless — and shirtless — as ever, bert spills on bodily emissions, being bullied by his kids and the explosive end to his family's escape room outing.

name: chris rock: tamborine
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: chris rock
describle: chris rock takes the stage in brooklyn for a comedy special filled with searing observations on fatherhood, infidelity and american politics.

name: jimmy carr: the best of ultimate gold greatest hits
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: jimmy carr
describle: nothing is off limits as jimmy carr serves up the most outrageous jokes from his stand-up career in a special that's not for the faint of heart.

name: bill burr presents: friends who kill
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: bill burr, michelle wolf, jimmy carr
describle: in a night of killer comedy, bill burr hosts a showcase of his most raucous stand-up comic pals as they riff on everything from covid to michael jackson.

name: anthony jeselnik: thoughts and prayers
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: anthony jeselnik
describle: there's no subject too dark as the comedian skewers taboos and riffs on national tragedies before pulling back the curtain on his provocative style.

name: ron white: if you quit listening, i'll shut up
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: ron white
describle: ron “tater salad” white dishes out his signature brand of cynicism, riffing on sex, celebrity and the sinister habits of wild geese.

name: bo burnham: make happy
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: bo burnham
describle: combining his trademark wit and self-deprecating humor with original music, bo burnham offers up his unique twist on life in this stand-up special.

name: bert kreischer: the machine
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: bert kreischer
describle: from his run-in with a grizzly bear to partying with the russian mafia, the shirtless comic returns with laugh-out-loud tales in this stand-up special.

name: joe rogan: strange times
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: joe rogan
describle: outspoken as ever, comedian joe rogan takes on current culture, pro wrestling, pot laws, cats, vegans and more in a stand-up special shot in boston.

name: alex fernández: the best comedian in the world
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: alex fernández
describle: comic alex fernández performs his familiar autobiographical stories but goes a little deeper this time with a tender tale about one of his six siblings.

name: anthony jeselnik: fire in the maternity ward
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: anthony jeselnik
describle: forging his own comedic boundaries, anthony jeselnik revels in getting away with saying things others can't in this stand-up special shot in new york.

name: jim norton: mouthful of shame
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: jim norton
describle: in this unrestricted jaunt through a gleefully filthy mind, comic jim norton offers a personal perspective on romance, desire and sexual proclivities.

name: jim jefferies: freedumb
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: jim jefferies
describle: returning for a second netflix comedy special, jim jefferies unleashes his famously ferocious black humor to a packed house in nashville, tennessee.

name: jack whitehall: i'm only joking
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: jack whitehall
describle: jack whitehall hits the stage with hilarious tales about happy couples, life in hotels, human stupidity and his well-traveled father.

name: francesco de carlo: cose di questo mondo
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: francesco de carlo
describle: taking the stage in milan, francesco de carlo opens up about his bad habits, religion, politics and what he's learned from traveling the world.

name: tracy morgan: staying alive
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: tracy morgan
describle: in his first special since his serious car accident, tracy morgan cracks jokes about life in a coma, his second marriage and his family's dark side.

name: jim jefferies: high & dry
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: jim jefferies
describle: no topic is off limits for jim jefferies as he muses on stoned koalas, his dad’s vasectomy confusion and choosing between his hair and his sex drive.

name: 85 south: ghetto legends
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: dc young fly, karlous miller, chico bean
describle: dc young fly, karlous miller and chico bean bring their hit podcast to the stage for a one-of-a-kind comedy event where nothing and no one is off limits.

name: sebastian maniscalco: is it me?
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: sebastian maniscalco
describle: in a lively stand-up set, sebastian acts out life’s little agonies, from school drop-offs to off-leash dogs to date nights with his wife.

name: andrew santino: cheeseburger
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: andrew santino
describle: no topic is safe in this unfiltered stand-up set from andrew santino as he skewers everything from global warming to sex injuries to politics.

name: mathieu dufour at bell centre
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: mathieu dufour
describle: in a freewheeling stand-up performance for a packed montreal arena, the comedian shares stories about paintball mishaps, mcdonald’s misdeeds and more.

name: hasan minhaj: the king's jester
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: hasan minhaj
describle: hasan minhaj shares his thoughts on fertility, fatherhood and freedom of speech in this follow-up to his award-winning comedy special “homecoming king.”

name: hannah gadsby: something special
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: hannah gadsby
describle: a panicky proposal. a novelty wedding cake. a fateful bunny encounter. hannah gadsby shares tales of love and marriage in this feel-good comedy special.

name: john mulaney: baby j
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: john mulaney
describle: a chaotic intervention. an action-packed stay in rehab. after a weird couple of years, john mulaney comes out swinging in his return to the stage.

name: mae martin: sap
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: mae martin
describle: from a mythical moose encounter to the gender spectrum in "beauty and the beast," mae martin reflects on a world off its axis in this comedy special.

name: ay: spotting the difference
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: ayo makun
describle: in his eclectic debut special, ayo “ay” makun hilariously holds forth on eccentric pastors, media bias and the untold wonders of medical payment plans.

name: deon cole: charleen’s boy
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: deon cole
describle: in an electric stand-up special, deon cole ponders romance, racist hotel showers, post-coital bedtime prayers and why he loves women of a certain age.

name: neal brennan: blocks
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: neal brennan
describle: from the weird relationship humans have with dogs to how dating a model is like owning a dune buggy, neal brennan muses on his life in this stand-up special.

name: kev adams: the real me
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: kev adams
describle: at age 30, french comic kev adams gets up close and personal about how life has changed since his big break 12 years ago — and not always for the best.

name: sommore: queen chandelier
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: sommore
describle: this queen of comedy shines as she takes the stage to sound off on her suspicion of free stuff, social media prayer requests, fake lashes and ugly shoes.

name: fortune feimster: good fortune
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: fortune feimster
describle: getting engaged. getting iced. getting a mind-blowing butt massage. fortune feimster shares uproarious stories from her life in this stand-up special.

name: tom papa: what a day!
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: tom papa
describle: tom doles out truths about post-marriage intimacy, his problematic pet pug and why men are to blame for most of life's inconveniences.

name: nick kroll: little big boy
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: nick kroll
describle: nick kroll shares his comedian origin story, his first heartbreak, his strange hypnosis experience and the trash-talking celebrity voice in his head.

name: teetotaler
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: olu salako
describle: nigerian comedian slkomedy sends up social issues and pokes fun at the monarchy, politics and navigating the single life in his second stand-up special.

name: johanna nordström: call the police
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: johanna nordström
describle: the comedian and podcast host sounds off on sexual escapades, tiktok police and how she became sweden's pandemic poster girl.

name: panayotis pascot: almost
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: panayotis pascot
describle: french television darling panayotis pascot opens up about his love life and upbringing in this hilarious and touching comedy special.

name: def comedy jam 25
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: dave chappelle, steve harvey, cedric the entertainer
describle: in this special live event, giants of stand-up come together to commemorate the 25th anniversary of russell simmons's groundbreaking "def comedy jam."

name: steve martin and martin short: an evening you will forget for the rest of your life
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: steve martin, martin short
describle: longtime pals and showbiz icons steve martin and martin short share countless quips, catchy tunes and hilarious stories about their lives in comedy.

name: adam sandler 100% fresh
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: adam sandler
describle: from "heroes" to "ice cream ladies" -- adam sandler's comedy special hits you with new songs and jokes in an unexpected, groundbreaking way.

name: chris rock total blackout: the tamborine extended cut
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: chris rock
describle: in this extended cut of his 2018 special, chris rock takes the stage for a special filled with searing observations on fatherhood, infidelity and politics.

name: oh, hello on broadway
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: nick kroll, john mulaney
describle: two delusional geriatrics reveal curious pasts, share a love of tuna and welcome a surprise guest in this filming of the popular broadway comedy show.

name: george lopez: we'll do it for half
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: george lopez
describle: comedian george lopez tackles the future and the past of latinx culture in america, touching on immigration, his tough relatives, aging and much more.

name: cristela alonzo: lower classy
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: cristela alonzo
describle: the irrepressible alonzo skewers latino stereotypes, pricey luxuries and her mother's tough-love parenting in a night of sly and infectious comedy.

name: iliza shlesinger: unveiled
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: iliza shlesinger
describle: here comes the bride, and she's got plenty to say. newlywed iliza shlesinger dissects wedding traditions as she mines her nuptials for laughs.

name: jen kirkman: just keep livin’?
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: jen kirkman
describle: incisive comic jen kirkman gets real about women's bodies, the value of alone time and an italian private tour guide who may have been a ghost.

name: tig
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: tig notaro
describle: comedian tig notaro announced her cancer diagnosis at what became a legendary stand-up set in 2012. follow her search for humor amid devastating news.

name: tiffany haddish: black mitzvah
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: tiffany haddish
describle: on her 40th birthday, tiffany haddish drops a bombastic special studded with singing, dancing and raunchy reflections on her long road to womanhood.

name: london hughes: to catch a d*ck
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: london hughes
describle: bawdy comedian and television presenter london hughes revisits her past in this acclaimed breakout special filled with unfiltered tales and wild stories.

name: iliza shlesinger: confirmed kills
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: iliza shlesinger
describle: the stand-up sensation tackles tv's "shark tank," what it means to be a woman and how to deal with the lawless party goblin that lives in us all.

name: iliza shlesinger: freezing hot
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: iliza shlesinger
describle: smart and brazen comedian iliza shlesinger applies her fresh, laugh-out-loud perspective to the universal struggles between men and women.

name: christina p: mom genes
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: christina pazsitzky
describle: comedian christina p examines the joys and drags of parenting, partnering and more through a no-nonsense gen-x lens in this special.

name: hannah gadsby: nanette
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: hannah gadsby
describle: australian comic hannah gadsby reshapes standard stand-up by pairing punchlines with personal revelations on gender, sexuality and childhood turmoil.

name: aditi mittal: things they wouldn't let me say
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: aditi mittal
describle: trailblazing comic aditi mittal mixes topical stand-up with frank talk about being single, wearing thongs and the awkwardness of indian movie ratings.

name: miranda sings live…your welcome
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: colleen ballinger
describle: viral video star miranda sings and her real-world alter ego colleen ballinger share the stage in a special packed with music, comedy and "magichinry."

name: nicole byer: bbw (big beautiful weirdo)
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: nicole byer
describle: karens gone wild. cat funerals. trying to hook up during lockdown. nicole byer gets delightfully down and dirty in her first netflix comedy special.

name: tig notaro happy to be here
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: tig notaro
describle: comedian tig notaro unleashes her inner prankster in a playful stand-up special packed with funny anecdotes, parenting confessions and more.

name: jenny slate: stage fright
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: jenny slate
describle: jenny slate's first stand-up special is a mix of stage time, funny stories about adulthood and conversations with family in her childhood home.

name: carolin kebekus: the last christmas special
creator: guillermo del toro
starring: carolin kebekus
describle: carolin kebekus unpacks the many headaches of the christmas season, from intense hangovers to the agony of advent calendars to a big gift-giving gap.

name: maria bamford: old baby
creator: guillermo del toro
